name: Sudeshna
wishText: May your day be filled with surprises, joy, and an unlimited supply of cupcakes!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Many many happy blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now go enjoy your day!
replayText: p.s there's 1 year of spotify premium hidden somewhere
